meanings.sent1: The kitten was the feeblest of all the litter, struggling to climb even the smallest step.
meanings.sent2: After being sick for a week, she felt at her feeblest when trying to lift the heavy grocery bags.
meanings.sent3: The feeblest attempt at lifting weights resulted in the dumbbells crashing to the floor with a loud clang.
meanings.sent4: His feeblest effort in the race was still faster than most, showing his natural talent.
meanings.sent5: The feeblest light in the room barely illuminated the dark corners, casting eerie shadows.

meanings.definition: Lacking in force, effectiveness, or vitality
meanings.sent1: The feeblest argument he presented failed to convince anyone of his point of view.
meanings.sent2: The old flashlight's feeblest beam barely reached the end of the dark hallway.
meanings.sent3: Her feeblest attempt at singing made the audience chuckle, but she sang with joy.
meanings.sent4: The feeblest attempt at negotiation only served to worsen the already tense situation.
meanings.sent5: The feeblest plant in the garden struggled to grow, overshadowed by its vibrant neighbors.

meanings.definition: Lacking in intelligence or mental strength
meanings.sent1: The feeblest excuse he could come up with for missing the meeting was that he overslept.
meanings.sent2: Her feeblest attempt at solving the puzzle left her frustrated and confused.
meanings.sent3: The feeblest student in the class struggled to understand even the simplest math problems.
meanings.sent4: His feeblest memory of the event was hazy, unable to recall important details.
meanings.sent5: The feeblest mind in the group often got lost in complex discussions, needing explanations.
